DESCRIPTION: The incantation of Ka, Tu or Lu, produces the effect of the respective power and then removes it.
Creatures with Essence gain health equal to half of their Essence rounded down at the start of their turn. Each turn, Essence is reduced by #b1.
Creatures with Flux take damage equal to the amount of Flux on all creatures at the start of the enemy turn. Each turn, Flux is reduced by #b1.
Upon Chant, gain 4 Block and apply 3 Flux to a random enemy.
Upon Chant, apply 3 Flux to a random enemy and draw a card.
Upon Chant, draw a card and gain 4 Block.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
